### [Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2562232/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0_tt_5_nm_3_in_0_q_birdman)

Director: Alejandro González Iñárritu

Starring: Michael Keaton, Edward Norton, Emma Stone, Naomi Watts

Genre: Comedy/Drama

Ratings: IMDb: 7.7/10; Rotten Tomatoes: 91%

---

### We Watched It

Michael Keaton plays a former superhero actor who is trying to reclaim fame by directing a Broadway play. However, what stands out isn’t just the character’s struggle—it’s Keaton’s real-life parallel. You’ll love how the movie blends reality and fantasy, constantly pulling you between Keaton’s inner turmoil and surreal moments. However, the unconventional narrative may feel disjointed to those who prefer straightforward storytelling. This is for the fans of introspective films like *Black Swan* or *Whiplash*.

![Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)](/images/birdman-or--the-unexpected-virtue-of-ignorance---2014--k5NT.webp)

---

### Behind the Scenes

Birdman holds a special connection to its lead actor, Michael Keaton. He was once famous for playing a superhero (Batman) but faced a career lull afterward.

---

### 3 Animated Movies

[Zootopia (2016)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2948356/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1)  – With its colorful world and clever narrative, Zootopia stands out as more than just a children’s film. Its exploration of prejudice and the power of acceptance has resonated deeply with viewers of all ages. You’ll love the witty dialogue and adorable characters, but prepare for the message being a little too heavy-handed at times.

[The Incredibles (2004)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0317705/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1) continues to be a fan favorite for its mix of superhero action and family dynamics. It’s funny, exciting, and surprisingly deep when it comes to family relationships. It skews more toward adults in its humor and themes, but still a must-watch.

[Spirited Away (2001)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0245429/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1) – This enchanting Studio Ghibli film follows a young girl trapped in a magical spirit world who must find a way to save her parents. Its stunning animation and rich storytelling make it a timeless classic that resonates with audiences of all ages.

---

### Binge-Worthy TV

[The Mandalorian (2019-present)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8111088/) – With its blend of epic Star Wars lore and fresh storytelling, The Mandalorian has quickly become a must-watch for both die-hard fans and newcomers to the franchise. The show follows a lone bounty hunter, played by Pedro Pascal, as he navigates the galaxy’s lawless outer regions. You’ll love the stunning visuals, the bond between the Mandalorian and "The Child" (Baby Yoda), and the series’ ability to bring something new to the Star Wars universe. While some episodes have a slower pace, the cinematic feel, and rich world-building make it an addictive watch.

---
